title: So I met this player on LoL
body: And this person is saying that she's a girl, I don't believe her, she says that she broke up with his bf, okay seems legit, chats like a girl, okay kind of legit, she lives In NZ, Okay seems legit again, She keeps calling me babe, okay I'll call her babe back, the reason I'm doubting that she's a women because this happened to me before, a 12 year old kid trolling me, acting as a 18 year old girl and after 2 days he says I'm a man. Fucking disappointed. And now it seems I met another person acting as a girl or maybe is actually a girl. And what really seems suspicious is that she doesn't have Facebook or Instagram, hmm kind of suspicious. So what's your thoughts guys? Would you believe that she's a girl

replies.body: ur getting baited by boys and u like it
Wouldn't it be gay on his side acting as a girl?

They probably just get a kick out of it.. it is pretty funny though. If you don't want it to happen again you shouldn't completely trust anyone with what they say about who they are, until you can get some kind of proof or rule out that they're not pretending.
hahaha holy %%%% op, that's so pathetic.

It bothers me that whetehr or not this person is actually a girl is a big deal for you. You've probably met plenty of girls on her who haven't stated they are female. If they don't have to, and if this is the reaction they get, then I would agree with women on video games not typing "I am female" to everyone.
maybe I'm out of touch, but i thought were all here to play video games.
If we were here to play video games, wouldn't we be playing video games instead of being on a website talking about playing video games?
I wouldn't believe her.
Stop trying to meet girls online, period.

if it was a girl
i wouldn't give a flying fu.ck
i'll be just like' oh, this a girl, mk then' 

Keep your pants on men.

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
i'd leave your sexual endeavors outside of games for your own sake

12 year old kid =man... 
Skype with her or something when you play a game together.
This person did say that they were going to make a Skype account just so she can show me his/her face, this is getting super suspicious.

There is still people that don't have FB/Instagram/whatever else is %%%%ing popular.

Hell i'm considering deleting my facebook cause it's just annoying half the time.

And if they are creating a skype account to do that, then it might be a chick, just get some proof, it really isn't that hard.
So what's the verdict, is your new boyfriend up to scratch?
Well I guess you will find out then soon enough.
Yeah you can be reassured, that she is a G.I.R.L.

Okay, is that just your instincts saying she is a girl, it'd be freaking embarrassing if I get trolled by the same thing twice

Edit# I don't even know why I care so much! might aswell talk about it
G.I.R.L is a guy in real life...lol
